author: Fextralife
description:
Titan Quest 2 NEW GAMEPLAY - Everything We Learned From the Playtest Demo
https://titanquest2.wiki.fextralife.com/Titan+Quest+2+Wiki
In this Titan Quest 2 video, I'm going to be talking about my hands-on impressions of the Titan Quest 2 Playtest that just dropped a couple of hours ago. If you guys haven't heard about this, there is a playtest on Steam for this that you can request access to, and if you get accepted you can play through. My understanding is that this playest will run through Sunday, so you don't have a very long time to check this out.

0:00 - Titan Quest 2 Playtest Impressions
0:27 - Titan Quest 2 Playtest Gameplay
2:58 - Titan Quest 2 Masteries
4:57 - Loot
5:44 - Attributes
6:45 - Progression
7:57 - Story Telling
8:21 - Boss Fight
9:51 - Final Thoughts
12:19 - Earth, Storm and Warfare Skill Tree

Don't forget to like the video and subscribe to our channel for more!

title: Titan Quest 2 NEW GAMEPLAY - Everything We Learned From the Playtest Demo
